sites_asanaNameWithTrigger.message: Asana (when you complete a task or subtask using buttons or checkboxes - no drag/drop trigger)

sites_githubNameWithTrigger.message: Github (when you mark an issue as <status name>) Comma-separated list of status names to trigger animation

sites_jiraNameWithTrigger.message: Jira (when you mark an issue as <status name>) Comma-separated list of status names to trigger animation - no drag/drop Kanban trigger

sites_trelloNameWithTrigger.message: Trello (when you drop a card on <list name>) Comma-separated list of list names to trigger animation

sites_wrikeNameWithTrigger.message: Wrike (when you complete a task or subtask using buttons or checkboxes - no drag/drop trigger)
